title: Useful
text: Something useful will be added soon, I apologize for not doing it already.

title: Soumya Mukhopadhyay
text:
I am an undergrad studying Data Science at IIT Madras with a keen interest in the realms of machine learning, data science, econometrics and quantitative finance. I like to learn new things, seeking knowledge in domains besides tech as well whenever time and circumstances allow me. In leisure, I like to spend time with my wonderful family and friends. There’s nothing quite like sharing laughter and creating memories together.
I am also fond of physics, deep conversation might lead to question my majors. Other things I like to talk about range to history and philosophy however I haven’t explored as many texts as I aspired to. I desire to travel to many parts of the world, soaking myself in different cultures and create unforgettable memories. Music and chess are the others things that I like a lot, not much of a professional, I play chess for fun.

title: Hello, I’m Soumya!
text:
Welcome to my website! If you are looking for some awesome resources, I continuously keep updating them in - useful.
While you are here, you can check my “About me”. I will add my CV soon, but don’t ask me when, right now its an empty page.
